IMPORTANT MESSAGE
Feb 15th FOR Arthur Liu TIME 9:14 PM OF Jean-Luc PHONE/MOBILE 646 286 7000 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL WILL CALL AGAIN RUSH SPECIAL ATTENTION RETURNED YOUR CALL MESSAGE That he called again

IMPORTANT MESSAGE
FOR Jeff DATE 9/11/05 TIME 8:08 A.M. M Jean-Luc OF PHONE/MOBILE 646 286 7000 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL WILL CALL AGAIN RUSH SPECIAL ATTENTION RETURNED YOUR CALL MESSAGE He has a teacher for you to teach you how to speak Russian. Sher is 2x8 years old not blonde. Lessons are free and you can have 1st today if you called
07/26/17 Page 2655 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032968

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned image of two 'IMPORTANT MESSAGE' slips, with handwritten notes on them. The image is slightly faded and has some speckles, but the text is generally legible.
